section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Vereniging ION is the Dutch Surface Technology Association and take care of the interest of the Dutch industry in general, and the Dutch surface technology industry in particular. 
 
The main goal of ION is to develop a state of the art surface technology industry that can fulfill the requirements of the production industry in a safe way. 
 
ION is in charge for all kinds of surface technology for all kind of substrates. 
 
The main goal is: 
* Durable products. 
* Sustainable companies. 
* Sustainable production processen (circular economy).
relevant_communication:
ION do have contact with MEP's (breakfast meetings), employees of the DG's and the Permanent Representation of the Netherlands. 
 
ION is member of CETS and Orgalime (Task Force Substances). 
 
ION is in close contact with ECHA Helsinki.
